code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import Navbar from'../components/Navbar';import Loader from'../components/Loader';import TicketCard from'../components/TicketCard';import Button from'../components/Button';import{useTickets}from'../hooks/useTickets';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AdminTickets=()=>{const{tickets,loading,fetchAllTickets}=useTickets();useEffect(()=>{fetchAllTickets();},[]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-gradient-to-br from-slate-50 via-blue-50 to-indigo-100",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"max-w-6xl mx-auto p-8",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Loader,{})})]});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-gradient-to-br from-slate-50 via-blue-50 to-indigo-100",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-7xl mx-auto p-8 space-y-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center justify-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{className:"text-4xl font-bold bg-gradient-to-r from-gray-900 to-gray-700 bg-clip-text text-transparent",children:["All Tickets (",tickets.length,")"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/admin",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"secondary",children:"\u2190 Dashboard"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6",children:tickets.map(ticket=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/admin/tickets/".concat(ticket.id),className:"block",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TicketCard,{onClick:()=>{},ticket:ticket})},ticket.id))})]})]});};export default AdminTickets;
